articles.title: Celtic 1-2 Rangers: Carl Starfelt's own goal in extra-time sends Gers into Scottish Cup final - Sky Sports
articles.description: Rangers showed no sign of a European hangover as they beat Celtic after extra-time at Hampden Park to reach their first Scottish Cup final since 2016.
articles.content:
Rangers showed no sign of a European hangover as they beat Celtic after extra-time at Hampden Park to reach their first Scottish Cup final since 2016 and end their rivals' treble dream.

articles.title: Children in Europe and the US are mysteriously coming down with a strange liver disease - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: Young kids in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Spain, and the United States have been coming down with a mysterious liver disease that does not stem from hepatitis A, B, C, D, and E. Doctors are baffled.
articles.content:
Nothing baffles people more than a disease that targets kids.
